website_summaries.verdict: A traditionally design corner TV cabinet, with functional storage solutions and a solid build.
pros: Hidden storage solution offers 2 adjustable shelves and ample room for components
Cable access points allow for wire management and are discreetly placed
Unit measures in at a convenient 49.5-inches long by 20-inches wide by 32-inches high
Built from a mixture of solid wood and engineered wood in a bright white finish
cons: Some users report having received damaged elements, making assembly difficult

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: instructions were not specific to the model and once we had it put together it was very fragile. One of the legs broke when we set it up. I have it placed in a corner of the room but I'm sure it will fall apart if I need to move.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quality, hard and time consuming to put together, plus it came in a smashed box with all kinds of dents and dings.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did the right thing and gave me a partial refund since we didn't want to go to the trouble of taking it apart and shipping back....too time consuming, heavy and difficult. With that said, we like how it fits in the corner and works well to hold tv stuff and games.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Vigna

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This stand is super cute and goes perfectly with our decor. The stand is quality and heavy..great value..we are very happy with it...I highly recommend getting one...
customer_reviews.author: seans mom

customer_reviews.title: Product was broken on delivery
customer_reviews.text: 4 pieces of this entertainment center were cracked severely compromising the structural integrity of the cabinet. The manufacturer, Home Styles, refused to replace all the pieces that were damaged. Home Styles does not stand behind their products and did nothing to resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dull

customer_reviews.title: Broke one off as soon as we tried to move it but it does look just as good without the legs and it is hard to find ...
customer_reviews.text: As the reviews said, the legs just aren't stable enough on this stand. Broke one off as soon as we tried to move it but it does look just as good without the legs and it is hard to find a white corner stand!
customer_reviews.author: Jozee

customer_reviews.title: Fine Quality at a modest price
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived undamaged which was surprising considering the condition of the shipping box. Keep in mind this comes in one box which weighs over 100 pounds. The instructions were quite clear except for the location of the two inner panels ( I got them reversed only to discover this error when installing the top ). The quality is quite good for such a modest price. All of the parts fit well and look professionally built. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Sayer

customer_reviews.title: I can't use the this product. It is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't use the this product. It is a piece of junk. It literally was falling apart during assembly. Product is just too heavy for me to return. We are disposing of it in pieces. $400 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A Scorn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but a bit tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great looking but a bit tricky to assemble - I had to sit on top of it to hold it down white my husband secured the top.
customer_reviews.author: theshamanswife

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Real junk. Tried to move it and legs collapsed. ..am trying to glue them back on.....
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: This looks good but it made very poorly
customer_reviews.text: This looks good but it made very poorly. It came split on one corner and we had to repair it. The legs are very cheap and bend when we moved it. Ok, but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Connnelly

customer_reviews.title: Some of the holes for the cams were pre drilled ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the holes for the cams were pre drilled were incorrectly making it impossible to have the stand be put together. It will require me to buy some additional screws to be able to hold it together.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Feuerherm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in the room. Adds a nice beachy touch. Not hard to assemble. Did it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Easy to put together with easy to follow instructions. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Will Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: poor instructions too
customer_reviews.text: The legs broke off :( and it is so heavy when I tried to move it the back legs fell off. poor instructions too!
customer_reviews.author: Bozena Struk

product_meta.title: Home Styles Bermuda White Corner TV Stand with Adjustable Shelves, Two Storage Cabinets, Cable Access, Textured Brushed White Finish, Shutter Styling, and Turned Feet
product_meta.description: The Bermuda corner TV stand is constructed of poplar solids and engineered wood in a refreshing, multi-step textured brushed white finish. Further inspiration can be found in the shutter doors and turned feet. Ample component storage is provided in the space saving, corner TV stand's center compartment with two adjustable shelves as well as in the two storage cabinets, each with two adjustable shelves. Effectively hidden cable access points allow for neat wire management. Easy to assemble. Measures 49-1/2-inch width by 20-inch depth by 32-inch height.
feature_bullets: Made of poplar solids and engineered wood in a refreshing in multi-step textured brushed white finish
Features two adjustable shelves as well as in the two storage cabinets, each with two adjustable shelves
Effectively hidden cable access points allow for neat wire management
Measures 49-1/2-inch width by 20-inch depth by 32-inch height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
